name: action-harden-runner
description: This action aims to harden runner workflows via multiple methods. \ Metapod used Harden. It's very effective.

scripts.build: ncc build src/index.js -o dist && ncc build src/post.js -o dist/post && ncc build src/monitor.js -o dist/monitor && ncc build src/utils.js -o dist/utils && ncc build src/abusech.js -o dist/abusech
